content.raw:
Really though, thanks for reporting this!

We're in the middle of transitioning our build system to something more maintainable (`ignition-cmake`), so it's useful to know where these kinds of loose threads are (like our tutorial being out of date). Pointing this out to us helps us identify which places are the most important for us to focus our update efforts.
content.html:
Really though, thanks for reporting this!

We're in the middle of transitioning our build system to something more maintainable (ignition-cmake), so it's useful to know where these kinds of loose threads are (like our tutorial being out of date). Pointing this out to us helps us identify which places are the most important for us to focus our update efforts.
